text: url character URL filepath character path file extension downloaded file. Leave NULL save temporary file ext character extension (ignored filepath defined), must one : .xlsx .xls verbose logical print messages console

what: Victorian Crime Statostics, Counts and rates. — read_vic_crime_stats
title: Victorian Crime Statostics, Counts and rates. — read_vic_crime_stats
text: quarter Victorian Crime Statistics Agence (CSA) publish data number criminal offenses related information. Data included Local Government Area

title: Victorian Crime Statostics, Counts and rates. — read_vic_crime_stats
code: read_vic_crime_stats(   dataset,   lga_input,   suburb_input,   postcode_input,   dim_code_input,   offence_div_code_input,   test = FALSE )

title: Victorian Crime Statostics, Counts and rates. — read_vic_crime_stats
text: https://www.crimestatistics.vic.gov.au/

title: Victorian Crime Statostics, Counts and rates. — read_vic_crime_stats
text: dataset Required. select database c("offence_by_location_by_lga", "offence_by_postcode_suburb", "offence_rate_by_lga") lga_input Optional. Filter LGA (.e. "Alpine") suburb_input Optional. Filter Suburb (.e. "Dederang") dim_code_input Optional. Filter dim code (.e. 11) offence_div_code_input Optional. Filter Offence Code (.e. "")

title: Victorian Crime Statostics, Counts and rates. — read_vic_crime_stats
text: data.frame

title: Victorian Crime Statostics, Counts and rates. — read_vic_crime_stats
text: Replaces data import component https://github.com/djpr-data/osd-nous-dashboard/blob/main/processing/offences--location-type-lga.R https://github.com/djpr-data/osd-nous-dashboard/blob/main/processing/offence--division-postcode.R https://github.com/djpr-data/osd-nous-dashboard/blob/main/processing/offences-rate--division-lga.R

title: Victorian Crime Statostics, Counts and rates. — read_vic_crime_stats
code: if (FALSE) {   lga_offence_rates <- read_vic_crime_stats(dataset = "offence_rate_by_lga")    Alpine_lga_offence_rates <- read_vic_crime_stats(dataset = "offence_rate_by_lga", lga_input = "Alpine") }

what: Victorian Rental Properties, Count and Median prices. — read_vic_median_rents
title: Victorian Rental Properties, Count and Median prices. — read_vic_median_rents
text: quarter Victorian Department Families Fairness Housing (DFFH) publish data number rental properties median price. Data included Local Government Area

title: Victorian Rental Properties, Count and Median prices. — read_vic_median_rents
Victorian Rental Properties, Count and Median prices. — read_vic_median_rents
text: data frame 11 variables. active dataset rows increase weekly: district character Broad area districts: Barwon South West Grampians Loddon Mallee Hume Gippsland North West Metro Eastern Metro Southern Metro METRO NON-METRO  area character Local Government Area (LGA) property character Property type based bedroom number date date Record date fields converted "Year Month" format variable character Type data value numeric Value mon character Month mon_num character Month number yr numeric Year

title: Victorian Rental Properties, Count and Median prices. — read_vic_median_rents
text: https://www.dffh.vic.gov.au/publications/rental-report

title: Victorian Rental Properties, Count and Median prices. — read_vic_median_rents
text: include character data set includes various spatial groupings can automatically filtered. Options : lga metro test logical testing avoid repeatedly downloading data

text: tibble

title: Victorian Rental Properties, Count and Median prices. — read_vic_median_rents

what: Victorian Property prices, yearly and recent median prices. — read_vic_property_prices
title: Victorian Property prices, yearly and recent median prices. — read_vic_property_prices
text: Victorian Property Sales Report released quarterly March, June, September December. covers median sale prices suburb/locality houses, units vacant land period 15 months.

title: Victorian Property prices, yearly and recent median prices. — read_vic_property_prices
Victorian Property prices, yearly and recent median prices. — read_vic_property_prices
text: data frame 11 variables. active dataset rows increase weekly: locality factor locality spatial grouping data cdate character date shown spreadsheets date date last day period indicated time_scale median numeric median dollar value property sales within time_scale time_scale factor indicating time period record: quarter year  type factor properties one : house unit vacant

title: Victorian Property prices, yearly and recent median prices. — read_vic_property_prices
text: https://www.land.vic.gov.au/valuations/resources--reports/property-sales-statistics

title: Victorian Property prices, yearly and recent median prices. — read_vic_property_prices
text: include character data set includes multiple temporal groupings can automatically filtered. Options : year quarterly test logical testing avoid repeatedly downloading data

title: Victorian Property prices, yearly and recent median prices. — read_vic_property_prices
text: tibble

title: Victorian Property prices, yearly and recent median prices. — read_vic_property_prices
text: Replaces data import component https://github.com/djpr-data/osd-nous-dashboard/blob/main/processing/house--land-prices.R
